16
THE DECEASED'S PARENTS AND THEIR CHILDREN
If one of the decedent's parents has died prior to the decedent and this parent has left no descendants, the portion of the estate that parent would have been entitled to had he or she survived the decedent shall be inherited by the other parent; if this parent, too, has died prior to the decedent, his or her descendants shall inherit both parents' portions of the estate, as provided by Article 15 of this Act.
